name: Parappa Funkin'
description:
Uh oh! Looks Like Your Stuck In Another Dimension And You Have To Rap To Get Out Of The Dimension Will You Make It?.

It's basically like DDR, press arrow when arrow over other arrow. And uhhh don't die..

Mods And Game Used:
Parappa as bf https://gamebanana.com/mods/download/184617

FNF: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Parrappa Rating Mod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/44323

Thats About It! Hope You Enjoy. I Wont Be Adding The Voices Sadly
